document_info.title: Oilahuasca Experience Reports
document_info.disclaimer: THIS IS DOCUMENTATION OF REPORTS, NOT ADVICE OR GUIDELINES
document_info.purpose: Recording of actual experience reports for research documentation

pure_myristicin_study.source: Quote from 'Nicky the Nickname' on Shroomery
pure_myristicin_study.finding: In one study, pure myristicin (from nutmeg) produced psychedelic effects in 6/10 participants
pure_myristicin_study.note: Individual variation likely due to CYP450 polymorphism

observations.with_enzyme_inhibitors: Can be highly psychedelic if combined with the right enzyme inhibitors
observations.eugenol_alone_high_dose: Eugenol on its own (in very high, stupid doses) produced body dissociation and a powerful dream-like awareness

angelicalist_initial_test.disclaimer: THIS IS A REPORT, NOT ADVICE OR GUIDELINES

protocol.step_2: 5-8 Drops of Clove Oil (poured tiny bit in cap of bottle)

timeline.duration_note: Still present at 1.5-2 hour mark, tapering off slowly

physical: Moving feet around a lot (while standing at work)
effects_reported.comparison_to_caffeine: Could be mistaken for Caffeine Effect, but Different - no Jitters like Caffeine
effects_reported.comparison_to_mescaline: 69Ron and Others said 'Mescaline' but this is nothing like Mescaline or Allylescaline - not like that at all

mechanism_notes.elemicin_role: According to the Method, it is actually supposedly the Elemicin that does most of Everything - Elemicin is the Input mainly
mechanism_notes.eugenol_role: Eugenol (from Clove Oil) is meant to Inhibit CYP Enzymes
mechanism_notes.myristicin_role: Myristicin also meant to inhibit CYP enzymes

notes_on_effect_variability.6_out_of_10_responders: Pure myristicin study showed only 60% of participants responded

possible_reasons.cyp1a2_polymorphism: Some people are ultra-rapid metabolizers - break down compounds too fast
possible_reasons.gut_microbiome: Endogenous amine availability (dimethylamine, piperidine, pyrrolidine) varies
possible_reasons.diet_factors: Recent food intake affects enzyme activity

notes_on_effect_variability.enhancement_strategy: Enzyme inhibitors (eugenol, piperine, etc.) may help non-responders by blocking rapid metabolism

effects: Not Tired but could easily fall asleep if wanted
Got everything done at Work, dealt with issues easier than normal
4_5_to_5_5_hour_mark.comparison_to_ephedrine: Had more Stimulant Effect from Clove/Nutmeg/Coffee than from the 25mg Ephedrine taken 6-7 hours before
4_5_to_5_5_hour_mark.no_crash: Coffee has a Crash after 5 Hours - this didn't crash, still feeling the maybe 'Euphoria'

6_5_hour_mark.conclusion: Headed Home, Definitely will be able to Sleep now
6_5_hour_mark.assessment: Very Small amount of Oil was used, but Definitely Worked

duration_explanation.statement: Effects are at least like 6+ Hours, which is to be expected
duration_explanation.mechanism: The whole Reason this Works is that we are using Eugenol and Myristicin to cause a Build up of Elemicin in the Body, and then Coffee to cause Breakdown into Metabolites
duration_explanation.goal: Overall the Goal is to Build up the Metabolites and Elemicin
duration_explanation.logic: Because we are Blocking Breakdown to cause Buildup, we would expect a longer Duration

protocol.same_as_before: Few Drops of Clove Oil, then about 1ml of Nutmeg
protocol.addition: Few Hours Later will take another 0.5-1ml of Nutmeg Extract
protocol.purpose: See what happens with redosing the Nutmeg

planned_second_test.preparation: Drinking Coffee now, took 25mg Ephedrine, will do Oil test in 5-6 Hours
planned_second_test.awaiting: Parsley Oil, Dill Oil, and Powdered Betel Nut have not arrived yet

ancient_knowledge_hypothesis.statement: I Personally believe that Ancient People knew about this
ancient_knowledge_hypothesis.motivation: That is a big part of why I am doing this, I Believe this is actually a Lost Science from the Ancient World
ancient_knowledge_hypothesis.conclusion: I don't think 69Ron was the First Person to come across this
